duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for supervising and coordinating activities for assigned functional area in the Distribution Center.
Monitors team members' productivity and work quality, and manages performance using available tools.
Mentors team members through on-the-job training and collaborates with DC Trainer on new team member orientation.
Establishes and cultivates morale and engagement of team members. Encourages participation in workplace activities and events.
Upholds compliance with all Centers of Excellence SOP's for each applicable functional area.
Collaborates with management to measure performance compliance and requirements, and directs appropriate actions to maintain performance at or above required levels.
Maintains appropriate records for team members, equipment, and KPI's under their responsibility.
Participates in administrative activities, defines resource needs, and assists in managing daily staffing needs for the designated department.
Participates in team member concerns: reporting, follow-up, investigating, or disciplinary process.
Promotes a safe environment and meets safety requirements complying with company policies and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree and at least 1 year experience in collaborating/leading team projects OR High School/GED and at least 4 years' experience in collaborating/leading team projects OR High School/GED and United States Armed Forces or equivalent experience demonstrating leadership skills.
